# Full document follows here

Shouldn't matter to the extractor what the content is, as long as the header is met.

Here's another header, that shouldn't be picked up:

```
Title: Boo. Hoo.
Summary: Land of boos and hoos.
Slug: boo-hoo
- - -
```

Well, that was fun.
